title: 'Anybody with a shop can now sell an Ola scooter': CEO Bhavish Aggarwal
description: Ola Electric has announced that its products will be available on the ONDC network starting next week. CEO Bhavish Aggarwal highlighted that now anyone with a shop can sell Ola Electric products, instead of just company-owned stores or exclusive dealerships. The company has also reported increased Q1 revenue despite wider losses.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
